attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The death penaly should be restored for murder and some cases of rape.
Allow the British public a referendum on this. Trust us to decide.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DeathPenalty2007/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
